com.atakmap.android.image.equirectangular

Class GLTexturedSphereProgram

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.image.equirectangular.GLTexturedSphereProgram

  • public class GLTexturedSphereProgram
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates and OpenGL shader program and geometry for rendering a sphere textured on the inside face. Call members only when holding valid GL context!

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • GLTexturedSphereProgram

        public GLTexturedSphereProgram(android.graphics.Bitmap texture)
                        throws GLTexturedSphereProgram.GLProgramException
        Create new textured sphere program. Uses supplied bitmap for texture if non-null
        Parameters:
        texture - bitmap to use as sphere's texture or null to defer texture upload
        Throws:
        GLTexturedSphereProgram.GLProgramException - if an error occurs during program creation

    • Method Detail

      • uploadTexture

        public void uploadTexture(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap)
                   throws GLTexturedSphereProgram.GLProgramException
        Upload new texture data, replacing any old texture data.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - new image to use as texture of the sphere
        Throws:
        GLTexturedSphereProgram.GLProgramException - if an error occurs

      • draw

        public void draw(float[] viewTransform)
          throws GLTexturedSphereProgram.GLProgramException
        Draw the textured sphere using the given view transformation
        Parameters:
        viewTransform - transformation matrix to apply to sphere
        Throws:
        GLTexturedSphereProgram.GLProgramException - if an error occurs while drawing
